verbs.description: [ARG1: The big question now] [V: is] : [ARG2: will the Trump presidency be a bridge toward a more positive or negative recalibration of America ’s role in the world] .
The big question now is : [V: will] the Trump presidency be a bridge toward a more positive or negative recalibration of America ’s role in the world .
The big question now is : [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARG1: the Trump presidency] [V: be] [ARG2: a bridge toward a more positive or negative recalibration of America ’s role in the world] .
